content:
Yes, Canard à la Rouennaise is a must-try dish when you visit Rouen! There are several restaurants that are known for serving this dish in the traditional way.

One of the most famous restaurants for Canard à la Rouennaise is La Couronne. This historic restaurant claims to be the place where the dish was invented in the 19th century. They still serve it today, using the same recipe and methods as they did over 100 years ago.

Another popular restaurant for Canard à la Rouennaise is Gill. The chef here is known for his innovative take on the dish, which includes using tangerine juice in the sauce.

Other restaurants that are worth trying for this dish include Les Archives, Le P'tit Zinc, and Les Maraîchers. Make sure to call ahead and reserve a table, as this dish is usually only served by request and takes several hours to prepare.
